sub_title: Customer Loyalty Member V at ING Hubs Poland / HR / Dutch / Customer Service
summary:
I am a self-starter with a strong ability to effectively multitask in a fast-paced environment.
Customer service professional with experience in de order management, in the Shared Service
environment, relationship management, marketing, account manager, looking to gain broad
experience with an international company.
Motivated team player with a track record of consistently exceeding expectations, in creating
and improving technologies in new projects, in preparing process documentation and tools
necessary to organize a new project, delivering exceptional quality and efficiency, strong
communication, leadership, and problem-solving skills.
I am very committed, enjoy cooperation and building positive business relationships with internal
and external customers in an international environment, always willing to learn new skills, take
on new challenges.

profile_positions.title: Financial Contract Management Specialist and Accouting Process Analyst with Dutch

profile_positions.description:
Job purpose:
To ensure all core refund-related processes within the team (verification, claiming, appeal handling for both VAT Refund and Excise Duty and account management) are dealt with effectively, correctly and on time, with a view to delivering service and quality excellence towards customers and agents, to maximizing refunds within legal givens and to minimize pre-financing costs. 

Key responsibilities and accountabilities:

Senior Customer Operations Representatieve and Accountmanager
• carrying out all core VAT refund-related processes within the team (verification,
claiming, handling tax authorities’ additional requests)
• managing accounts and delivering excellent customer service to internal and external
customers, stakeholders as well as VAT refund agents
• liaising with European tax authorities to develop and maintain good working relations
• translating tax authorities’ requests to other teams (on a daily basis) as well as
providing translations of customer packages, manuals and other business materials
• managing the induction program and providing a business-specific training to new
team members
• establishing, developing and maintaining positive business and customer
relationships
• negotiate contracts and close agreements to maximize profits
• performing role as the lead point of contact for all customer account management
matters
• expediting the resolution of customer problems and complaints to maximize
satisfaction
• helping customers through email, phone, online presentations
• assisting with challenging client requests
profile_positions.title: Senior Customer Operations Representatieve and Accountmanager (VAT Refund)
